High-level summary of all the project dependencies (to reference when 
creating requirements.txt or environment.yml files).

Functional
----------
numpy
scipy
pandas
scikit-learn
pytorch
torchvision (>=0.5.0 to avoid conflicts with pillow)

Plotting and Visualisation
--------------------------
matplotlib
tqdm

Documentation
-------------
sphinx
sphinx_rtd_theme

Packaging
---------
versioneer
twine

Testing
-------
pytest

Reporting
---------
fpdf

Other
-----
jupyter
